name: Eric and Debi's Seafood Seviche
author: Eric & Debi
summary: This is a fresh seafood dish that pops with flavor and keeps you coming back for more. Serve with toasted points of fresh, gourmet bread.
ingredients: ½ pound halibut fillets, cut into 1/4 inch cubes
10  peeled and deveined shrimp, cut into small pieces
4 large sea scallops, cut into small pieces
3 large jalapeno peppers, seeded and minced
directions: Stir the halibut, shrimp, scallops, lemon juice, and grapefruit juice together in a glass bowl
Cover, and refrigerate at least 6 hours until the halibut turns opaque
Stir the bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, onion, olives, ginger, sugar, salt, and tomato paste together in a glass bowl until no chunks of tomato paste remain
Drain the seafood, and add to the vegetable mixture along with the tomatoes
Gently stir until evenly combined, then return to the refrigerator to chill at least 15 minutes before serving
